title: ENLARGE MY HEART, O LORD
bible_ref: ...walk before me in integrity of heart, and in uprightness,... 1 Kings 9:4
verses: Enlarge my heart O Lord=That I may rightly perceive=Help me to understand=What the true burden of the Lord is=That I may not slack any more=Nor withhold myself from Holy use.
Perfect my sight O Lord=Help me to see as you see=Right values for eternal things=Lord give me cause my eyes to see=That I see not men as trees=Nor lose sight of my duty and call
